spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is correct, but door opening directions (E3) and exact window spacing on the bottom wall deviate from the technical blueprint.

structural_fidelity.notes: Adjacency is preserved and all major rooms (Utility, WC, Kitchen) are present. The wall thickness is consistent, though some door thresholds are modeled as simple gaps (E2).

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of appliances in Utility and Kitchen. The stove and sink placement perfectly match the detailing on the plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Very clean orthographic projection and clear geometry. Minimal artifacts. The lighting provides good depth perception.

detected_errors.description: Internal doors lack specific swing orientation shown in the floor plan (rendered as open gaps).
The window seat geometry is slightly simplified compared to the multi-faceted bay window detail in the blueprint.
The pantry/storage wall next to the kitchen appears slightly narrower in the 3D render than the dimensioned 2'-9" on the plan.
